document.full_text: alabama's supreme court ruled a key tax in jefferson county unconstitutional on wednesday, pushing the debt-ridden county a step closer to what would be the largest municipal bankruptcy in u.s. history.
document.title: alabama court pushes county closer to bankruptcy
lines_and_colors: alabama's supreme court ruled a key tax in jefferson county unconstitutional on wednesday, pushing the debt-ridden county a step closer to what would be the largest municipal bankruptcy in u.s. history.
